messages.subject: Latin (was Frustrations)
messages.msgSnippet: I rather enjoyed Winnie Ille Pooh.  Our 6 is learning Latin, though we aren t doing much in the way of teaching it to her, she just wants to decode that
messages.messageBody:
I rather enjoyed Winnie Ille Pooh. Our 6 is learning Latin,
though we aren't doing much in the way of teaching it to her, she
just wants to decode that "descendit, tump" we laugh about.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Bill and Diane" <cen46624@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 12, 2002 6:15 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Frustrations


| I took Latin in HS and now say "This Little Piggy" to my kids
in English
| and Latin.
|
| Hic parvus porcus venit in forum
| Hic parvus porcus remansit domi
| Hic parvus porcus habuit carnes bovinas assas
| Hic parvus porcus non habuit
| Hic parvus porcus cried oui, oui, oui all the way home.
|
| (They had messed up the last line in the Latin book, so I don't
know it.)
|
| :-) Diane
| I typed it from memory and spell check doesn't work in Latin,
so if it's
| imperfect that's why.
|
| >**One of my good friends is teaching her 8 yo Latin!**
| >
| >Latin is making quite a comeback. My best friend took it in
high
| >school, but at the time it was very unpopular and out of
favor.
| >
|
|
|
